title: BOS
contentChallenge: How does a well known South African brand become appealing to a new market of people as well as launching a new product?
contentSolution: Creating unique and fun events where people can experience the brand for the first time and other people can rediscover their love for it My team conceptualised the “Make It BOS!” campaign that would surprise and delight people. These events took place at Victoria Yard’s market in Joburg CBD. We started with the BOS Harvest where we had BOS Ice Tea cans hanging from trees where people could pick them off and enjoy them. We then went on to launch the BOS hot tea with a high tea party event, inviting micro influencers and artists from Victoria Yards to enjoy the spreadI wrote the social media posts, and all comms for this brand.
